overview_of_class: This is an introductory course to Hamiltonian Dynamics and Symplectic Geometry. Topics include Symplectic manifolds, Lagrangian and other special submanifolds, intersection properties, Hamiltonian equations, canonical transformations, integrable systems and normal forms, fixed point theorems and Arnold Conjecture.
name: Hamiltonian Dynamics and Symplectic Geometry
title: WCAS MATH 444-0-41 Hamiltonian Dynamics and Symplectic Geometry

descriptions.name: Overview of class
descriptions.value: This is an introductory course to Hamiltonian Dynamics and Symplectic Geometry. Topics include Symplectic manifolds, Lagrangian and other special submanifolds, intersection properties, Hamiltonian equations, canonical transformations, integrable systems and normal forms, fixed point theorems and Arnold Conjecture.

descriptions.name: Registration Requirements
descriptions.value: Graduate students in mathematics or advanced undergraduate students with instructor's approval.

subject: MATH
